content: आवसथः [आवस्-अथच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 116</ls>] {@--1@} A dwelling, dwelling-place, residence, house, habitation; निवसन्नावसथे पुराद्बहिः <ls>R. 8. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A resting place; asylum. {@--3@} A dwelling for pupils and ascetics. {@--4@} A village. {@--5@} A particular religious observance. {@--6@} A fire-sanctuary, a place where sacrificial fire is preserved.
